tool_description: You can easily get current weather data of a given city
name: Weather Data
title: Weather Data

api_list.name: Weather data
api_list.description: Returning weather details of a given city
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://weather-data16.p.rapidapi.com/weather/london"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather-data16.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://weather-data16.p.rapidapi.com/weather/{city_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weather-data16.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
